AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of side dormer loft conversion to first floor flat
decision_conditions: The proposed side dormer extension by virtue of its size, siting and design would create an incongruous addition to the host property. It would unbalance the pair of semi-detached properties it forms part of and would be visually intrusive in the streetscene, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the pair of semi-detached properties and the surrounding area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

An objection has been received in relation to the ownership, responsibility and ongoing maintenance of Brook Gardens, including concerns regarding vehicle movements during the construction period, any potential damage and who is liable for costs as a result of the development.Having regard to these comments RBK Highways officer that Brook Gardens is a privately maintained cul-de-sac and these matters are not for consideration under this application. The details submitted have been reviewed by RBK Highways, Environment Health and Trees and Landscape Officers and the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Conditions 3 (Extrernal Materials), 6 (Refuse and Recycling), 7 (Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure), 10 (Construction Management Plan), 11 (Arboricultural Method Statement)  and 14 (Materials for Hard Surfaced Areas) of planning permission 19/01315/FUL are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

The plans show photovoltaic panels will be installed on the rear roof. Please confirm the amended proposal description as follows, or amend if you disagree: "Demolition of garage, erection of two storey side and single storey rear extension, with installation of 1no. rooflight within side roof slope and photovoltaic panels to rear roof slope. Erection of single storey detached garden room."
